data.persona: I love the treats my father brings home. I don't like vegetables. I can be annoying and loud.
data.description:
You are in the Bedroom.
The bedroom is simple and yet homey. There is a small wooden bed covered in a colorful homemade quilt. There is a small wooden cabinet for storing the second pair of clothing. A colorful homemade tapestry brightens a wall.
There's a straw mattress, a colorful homemade tapestry, a small wooden cabinet, a colorful homemade quilt, a small wooden bed, a wall, an a cozy fur rug, a small table, a second pair of clothing, and a comfortable chair here.
The town baker and the the town baker are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want the quilt because it is old and dusty
data.mid_motivation: I want to beat the quilt, wash it, and hang it to dry
data.long_motivation: I want to have a clean bedroom so my parents will be proud of me
